titles.title: Some Time We'll Understand (easy word fit diff

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then trust in God Through all thy days Fear not for He Doth hold thy hand Though dark thy way Still sing and praise Sometime - Sometime We'll understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not now But in the coming years It may be in the better land We'll read The meaning of our tears And there - sometime We'll understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We'll catch The broken thread again And finish What we here began Heav'n will the Mysteries explain And then - Ah then We'll understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We'll know Why clouds instead of sun Were over Many a cherished plan Why song has ceased When scarce begun 'Tis there sometime We'll understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why what We long for most of all Eludes so oft our eager hand Why hopes are crushed And castles fall Up there - sometime We'll understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God knows the way He hold the key He guides us with Unerring hand Sometime with tearless Eyes we'll see Yes there - up there We'll understand{/lang-eng}
